fields.title: About
fields.content:
Disclaimer

The EMIF Catalogue is an on-going work of the IMI-funded research project EMIF (European Medical Information Framework). This system is continuously under development and we welcome your ideas and suggestions for improving this catalogue. 
All provided data are still provisional. We make no warranty and cannot be held responsible for any information retrieved and displayed in this catalogue. 

José Luis Oliveira (jlo@ua.pt)
University of Aveiro, Dept. Electronics, Telecommunications and Informatics (DETI / IEETA)

Available features:

Regular user

  • Accounting management (users, databases, workspaces)
  • Database management
  • Submission and edition (with the former questionary)
  • Inclusion of two distinct templates
  • Observational data (Unfinished template)
  • Cohorts (Dummy template)
  • Simple search
  • Advanced search
  • Results comparison

Admin

  • Questions/fingerprints
  • User
  • Templates

Near term planned features:

  • Templates definition
  • Enhance searching
